While the source of the fire had never been discovered — official sources said the fire had been the result of a gas leak — those who connected dots noticed that there had been several murders — some also linked to gas leaks, others not — in the days before the disaster. In the present day, those same, ignored people noticed that several mysterious deaths — once more attributed to gas leaks — were happening again, and wondered if there was a pattern. They were right.
